But rather than be overwhelmed by its power, I personally feel more like the RTX 3090 Ti is trying to trick, tempt and seduce me, Old Testament-style. “Recommend meeeee” it whispers, coasting through another maximum settings benchmark. “Tell evvvvvvveryone these frame rates are totally worth £1879.”


But I can’t. Sorry. While I am a sucker for go-faster gear, the RTX 3090 Ti is just too far of a stretch, with its sometimes imperceptible performance differences to the £1399 RTX 3090 and a tendency towards impractically gigantic partner card models.

 
Read more
articles.title: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3090 Ti review: the graphics card I want, but shouldn’t

articles.author: CJ Wheeler
articles.description:
Techland have announced that the first story DLC for their parkour-infused survival horror Dying Light 2: Stay Human will slip from its scheduled June launch date to September. The DLC is one of two planned paid story DLCs, with the second not targeted for any specific date outside of Techland’s promised five years of post-launch support for the game.

 
Read more
articles.title: Dying Light 2's first story DLC has been delayed to September

articles.author: Alice Bell
articles.description:
We're going macro this week, so we're talking about the best writing in video games. This is a very broad topic for discussion, so that means I also get to say 'ludonarrative dissonance' (we also describe 'ludonarrative harmony' as its opposite). Please don't let this put you off, though, because we do talk about some bloody well good games.
The times being what they are, though, results in us having a long discussion of patter theft, because some dreadful American (we assume) stole the "It's me, Blorko!" tweet and then just did a much worse version of it. Hang your head in shame, whoever you are. I also went to a first communion party and ate a lot of cake, and had a run in with a very charismatic toddler who may or may not be evil.
Read more
articles.title: The Electronic Wireless Show podcast episode 186: the best writing in games

articles.author: Katharine Castle
articles.description:
Bethesda have just announced they're delaying Starfield and Redfall until the first half of 2023. Bethesda's RPG space epic was originally due to arrive on November 11th 2022, with Arkane Austin's first-person vampire survival game Redfall arriving sometime this summer, but now both titles have been shifted back to an unknown time between Janauary and June next year.  
Read more
articles.title: Starfield and Redfall have both been delayed until 2023

articles.author: Antony Terence
articles.description:
Leave the doormat outside long enough in Age Of Darkness: Final Stand and you might not live to see the morning. If the game’s grimdark aesthetic didn’t warn you, here’s another from me directly: this game is brutal. Be mentally prepared to start over, over and over again. The “one more round” syndrome is strong with this mashup of tower defense and strategy.


The game’s premise is simple: survive. While the standard survival mode is challenging enough to warrant hours of gameplay, Age Of Darkness’s modifiers let you amp up the carnage for a nightmarish good time. See those little creatures all over your screen like bees in an unstable hive? Now picture building a settlement over them. 

 
Read more
articles.title: Grimdark RTS Age of Darkness: Final Stand throws thousands against your frail walls

articles.author: CJ Wheeler
articles.description:
John Romero, legendary developer and co-creator of PC classics Doom, Quake and Wolfenstein, has announced he’s writing an autobiography entitled 'Doom Guy – Life In First-Person'. The book isn't due to be published until early next year, but does this mean the Doom movie from 2005 starring Dwayne ‘The Rock’ Johnson is technically Romero’s biopic? Did The Rock not want to wear a wig? I’m very confused.

 
Read more
articles.title: Of course John Romero's autobiography is going to be called Doom Guy

articles.author: Alice O'Connor
articles.description:
In this job, I expend a lot of effort and care on details no one notices. While this is arguably a poor use of my time, I enjoy the process—and technically it is productive. But perhaps you, reader dear, might enjoy hearing about these small things, or at least find them interesting/weird. So let's talk about the work which went into producing one (1) screenshot and 43 seconds of video for last week's post about the Morrowind modder who added the family cat because their kids were afraid of mudcrabs.
Read more
articles.title: Screenshot Secrets: photographing Stripes the family cat in Morrowind

articles.author: CJ Wheeler
articles.description:
This week’s freebies at the Epic Games Store are Arkane Studios’ interplanetary immersive sim Prey and Thunder Lotus Games' Viking ‘em up Jotun: Valhalla Edition. You’ll be able to nab them for zero currency later on today, but for now there’s still time to grab last week’s complimentary game, Terraforming Mars (which you can do here). Check the Epic Games Store at around 8am PST / 4pm BST for the changeover.

 
Read more
articles.title: Prey and Jotun: Valhalla Edition are free on the Epic Games Store today

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Steam Deck software updates continue to refine Valve’s handheld PC. This time, the big new feature is the ability to create per-game performance profiles, which let you pick and choose from the Deck’s toy chest of power and battery-saving settings and apply your tailored configuration to a specific game at a time. You can then switch between games without having to manually re-adjust those settings every time you play something different.

 
Read more
articles.title: Steam Deck update adds per-game performance profiles

articles.author: Alice O'Connor
articles.description:
Last week, you decided (barely!) that drawbacks are better than a load of lasers. I feel I should've defined drawbacks more narrowly but there'll be chaos if introduce undosies. Onwards! Next, I present a choice between two oft-disliked things. What's better: controlling a turret, or little inconsequential choices?
Read more
articles.title: What's better: controlling a turret, or little inconsequential choices?

articles.author: Alice Bell
articles.description:
Loot River, the pixely roguelike with a bit of Souls and a bit of Tetris, is all about making multiple attempts to navigate weird dungeons made of moving platforms, before dying and starting again. It's one of those games that's perfect for Game Pass, at least in its current form, but that's going to be changing in a small bit, according to a post devs Straka Studio made yesterday. Straka note they are a small team who playtested with a very small group, and didn't realise the game would be unwelcoming to newcomers. In fact, they've already made some smaller tweaks to the game that have made quite a difference, but the most notable problem players raised was the lack of any, umm, loot? 
Read more
articles.title: Loot River devs "messed up" but will work to improve game, add actual loot

articles.author: CJ Wheeler
articles.description:
Good news! Geoff Keighley's Summer Game Fest megamix is going to be a much more condensed affair than last year's months-long relay of game announcements, clocking in at just four days for the core event. Phew. We already knew the event was going to kick off on June 9th, but Keighley has now revealed that the bulk of the announcements will be done and dusted by Sunday June 12th. And breathe... 

 
Read more
articles.title: Summer Game Fest 2022 will be mercifully more compact this year, running June 9-12th

articles.author: Sin Vega
articles.description:
Just a few days ago, the expected release of Songs Of Conquest turned into the expected release of Songs Of Conquest into early access. There are times when such a pivot might dramatically change the angle you'd need to review a game from.


This isn't really one of those times, because I think I'd be recommending Songs Of Conquest overall as it is anyway. Giving it an estimated year for Lavapotion to "figure out, together with the community, what features we should prioritize" could well push me into a wholehearted endorsement, though.

 
Read more
articles.title: Songs Of Conquest early access review: an already-stylish tactical RPG

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
I've not played Call Of Duty: Warzone in yonks. It used to take up practically all of my time, and now it's sat there neglected on my PC for the better part of a year or so. Even with King Kong and Godzilla arriving in the game today, I'm still playing Fortnite over it, which says it all, really.
Why did I stop playing Warzone? Other games came along, I suppose. Maybe I'd become a bit burned out, which would only be natural considering the amount of hours I spent ducking and trucking. But I think the way it's changed has played a big part in my departure. More specifically, there's been too much change. The game looks bonkers now.
Read more
articles.title: In the face of Warzone's endless churn, I admit defeat

articles.author: CJ Wheeler
articles.description:
The next update for free-to-play professional Breath Of The Wild impersonator Genshin Impact has been delayed, but developers MiHoYo have promised to hand out ‘compensation’ starting from today. MiHoYo announced the delay on Twitter last week due to “project progress”, but promised to issue Travelers with complimentary goodies every week until the launch of update 2.7. They don’t clarify when that update will be though. More info is in the full statement on MiHoYo’s site.

 
Read more
articles.title: Genshin Impact starts handing out freebies today to compensate for update 2.7's delay

articles.author: CJ Wheeler
articles.description:
Capcom have unveiled more deets about their upcoming beast-laden expansion Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak, including a closer look at its new big bad Elder Dragon Malzeno. Monster Hunter series producer Ryozo Tsujimoto and Sunbreak director Yoshitake Suzuki also debuted three more monsters you'll be meeting in the expansion during their latest digital broadcast, along with its new Switch Skill Swap ability and Follower Quests.

 
Read more
articles.title: Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak will have NPC companions, new monsters and a big bad vampire dragon

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
Source Of Madness is a side-scrolling roguelite set in a Lovecraftian setting populated by twisted Bamzooki. And it's a world where everything been procedurally generated with the help of machine learning. This makes for some fabulous, gloomy aesthetics and tormented beasts, but also means it's a messy roguelite with a loop that leads more to frustration than anything else.
Read more
articles.title: Source Of Madness review: machine learning makes this a messy roguelite

articles.author: Alice O'Connor
articles.description:
If you've enjoyed murdering monsters and gathering gems in Vampire Survivors, you might fancy a go on Gunlocked. It's an arcade shoot 'em up where you gather random weapons and upgrades (and so many gems) across a run but attacking is kinda out of your hands. I'm not much of a shmupper but Gunlocked has started scratching that Vampire Survivors itch for me, and it's less than £3.
Read more
articles.title: This spaceship shoot 'em up is kinda like Vampire Survivors

articles.author: CJ Wheeler
articles.description:
Creative Forge’s sci-fi real-time tactics game Stargate: Timekeepers is aiming to launch a public beta to coincide with its TV inspiration Stargate SG1’s 25th anniversary in July. Senior producer Neil McKenna pencilled in the timeframe at publisher Slitherine’s Home Of Wargamers event yesterday, while showing more new characters and gameplay from later in the campaign than when the game was last seen in December.

 
Read more
articles.title: Stargate: Timekeepers beta aims to launch in time for SG1’s 25th anniversary

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Microsoft have expanded their array of accessibility-focused PC hardware with the Adaptive Accessories range. Unveiled during yesterday’s Microsoft Ability Summit, the set comprises three devices - the Adaptive Mouse, the Adaptive Button, and the Adaptive Hub – that aim to make games and apps more usable for anyone, by allowing themselves to be customised with 3D-printed attachments. 

 
Read more
articles.title: Microsoft’s Adaptive Accessories are customisable peripherals with accessibility in mind

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
A leaker posting on the message board 4chan has shared a build of Duke Nukem Forever similar to that shown at E3 in 2001. The leaker started posting on Monday and, as collated by Duke fansite duke4.net, has since posted screenshots, videos, and download links. 3D Realms co-founder and Duke Nukem developer George Broussard commented via Twitter that "the leak looks real."

 
Read more
articles.title: Duke Nukem Forever's 2001 iteration has seemingly leaked

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Humble's spring sale is underway, with a decent set of discounts on some big games including Satisfactory, Valheim and Deep Rock Galactic. I am of course going to highlight Cyberpunk 2077 in particular though, which is 50% off.

 
Read more
articles.title: Humble's spring sale offers discounts on Resident Evil Village, Satisfactory

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Začleňovací okno Linuxu 5.19 je na spadnutí a do jádra míří patche implementující podporu Tesla FSD, Apple eFuse a NVMe pro čip M1, rychlejší USB4/TB pro Alder Lake či Intel In-Field Scan pro Xeony.
articles.title: Novinky pro Linux 5.19: autonomní řízení Tesla FSD či rychlejší USB4 / Thunderbolt

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Svatopluk Vít)
articles.description: Čteček elektronických knih už jsme viděli spoustu, většinou jsou si velmi podobné. Podíváme se ale podrobně na vlajkovou loď společnosti Pocketbook, která nabízí i barevné čtečky. Jaký je Inkpad Color?
articles.title: PocketBook Inkpad Color: fakt je ta čtečka barevná?

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: V šestém článku o vytváření, spouštění a řízení souběžných popř. paralelně běžících úloh v Pythonu nejdříve dokončíme popis knihovny Trio a posléze provedeme zhodnocení jednotlivých technologií.
articles.title: Souběžné a paralelně běžící úlohy naprogramované v Pythonu – závěrečné zhodnocení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Válka na Ukrajině probíhá už třetí měsíc a škody se nevyhnuly ani síťové infrastruktuře. Ta je sice v některých částech poničená, ale celkově internet na Ukrajině funguje překvapivě dobře. Proč to tak je?
articles.title: V jakém stavu je internet na Ukrajině? Většina sítě funguje díky decentralizaci

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jiří Sluka)
articles.description: Dnes si představíme webový prohlížeč pro decentralizované služby, budeme procházet výzkumné práce, představíme si správce mapování a přesměrování portů a nakonec extrahujeme Unity assety.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (18. 5. 2022): prohlížeč pro decentralizované služby

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Ceny energií skáčou v řádu desítek procent, což ovlivňuje také provoz datacenter. Ta se snaží ušetřit, ale možnosti jsou velmi omezené. Co se dá v takové situaci dělat? Může zákazník nějak cenu ovlivnit?
articles.title: Růst cen energií už musíme promítat na zákazníky, říká Martin Žídek z MasterDC

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Dnes se budeme zabývat problematikou komunikace mezi souběžně běžícími korutinami. Pro komunikaci se používají kanály, což je známý koncept, který však může přinášet řadu komplikací.
articles.title: Souběžné a paralelně běžící úlohy naprogramované v Pythonu – knihovna Trio (2)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: ALEF-CSIRT)
articles.description: V novém díle vám přinášíme zajímavá témata ohledně chování webových formulářů, škodlivého software s účtem na Dicsordu, či jak strojové učení vyzraje nad současnými systémy WAF.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: umělá inteligence drtí moderní webové aplikační firewally

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Red Hat oznámil spolupráci s automobilkou GM na vývoji operačního systému pro chytré automobily. Denní sestavení pro nadcházející verzi Ubuntu 22.10 „Kinetic Kudu“ jsou k dispozici pro vývojáře.
articles.title: Red Hat oznámil spolupráci s GM, denní sestavení Ubuntu 22.10

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: OpenJPEG 2.5 přináší řádové zrychlení dekódování formátu JPEG 2000, KDE za poslední týden s minimem novinek, ale spoustou oprav. openSUSE Tumbleweed přechází na GCC 12 a Chromium na Ubuntu podporuje Wayland.
articles.title: Chromium na Ubuntu s nativní podporou Waylandu, openSUSE Tumbleweed přešlo na GCC 12

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Red Hat už před několika dny oznámil chystané vydání distribuce RHEL 9.0, čímž zmátl část uživatelů, kteří si mysleli, že je už nová verze venku. Došlo k tomu až teď, tentokrát už opravdu Red Hat oznámil dostupnost RHEL 9.0 pro všechny zákazníky.
articles.title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.0 byl uvolněn pro zákazníky

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Komunita okolo linuxové distribuce vydala první verzi nové varianty openSUSE Leap Micro. Jde o komunitní klon komerční distribuce SUSE Linux Enterprise Micro, která je určena pro kontejnerové a virtualizační prostředí. První verze nese označení 5.2, aby měly komunitní i komerční verze stejné verzování.
articles.title: openSUSE Leap Micro: lehká distribuce pro kontejnery a virtuální prostředí

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: anonymní)
articles.description: Příští konference LibreOffice se bude konat 29. září až 1. října 2022 v italském Bolzanu. Program konference bude založen na následujících tématech: vývoj, API, rozšíření; zajištění kvality a testování software; kokalizace, dokumentace a projekty v původních jazycích; otevřený formát dokumentů, svobodné dokumenty a interoperabilita; propagace a marketing LibreOffice; diverzita a inkluze, noví přispěvatelé. Všechny přednášky budou streamovány a později budou dostupné ke stažení. The Document Foundation hledá přednášející.
articles.title: Konference LibreOffice 2022 proběhne v italském Bolzanu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Nová verze nejrychlejšího kodéru do video formátu AV1 tentokrát nepřináší velké změny, jde spíše o dílčí aktualizaci shrnující vývoj v posledním období. Phoronix uvádí, že z měření na CPU Ryzen 5000 nevyplývá, že by projekt přinesl větší výkonnostní optimalizace.
articles.title: Intel vydal SVT-AV1 1.1, přináší jen minimální změny oproti 1.0

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Microsoft Windows Subsystem for Linux dostává další zajímavou novinku. Díky spolupráci s Canonicalem mohou uživatelé Windows pod tímto subsystémem provozovat nejen „standardní Ubuntu“, ale také jeho vývojovou variantu, zde dostupnou jako Ubuntu (Preview). Vše je dostupné v rámci Microsoft Store.
articles.title: Ubuntu Preview, vyzkoušejte bleeding-edge Ubuntu ve Windows díky WSL 2.0

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Akcelerace kódování a dekódování video formátu H.264 (MPEG-4 AVC) skrze VA-API state tracker a Direct3D 12 API, tedy v podobě použitelné pod Windows Subsystem for Linux, míří do projektu Mesa.
articles.title: Microsoft přidal do projektu Mesa akceleraci H.264 skrze VA-API/Direct3D

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Sedmnáctý ročník konference OpenAlt chtějí organizátoři uspořádat jako tradiční konferenci, na které se účastníci potkají osobně. Proto jsme se vzdali tradičního termínu, který býval první víkend v listopadu, píše Jozef „JoeJoe“ Mlích na webu akce. Místo toho proběhně konference už 17. a 18. září 2022. Místo se ovšem nemění, OpenAlt proběhne v tradičních prostorách Fakulty Informačních Technologií VUT v Brně.
articles.title: OpenAlt 2022 proběhne v Brně už v září, hledá přednášející

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Google na začátku roku oznámil, že ukončí podporu původní služby G Suite zdarma. Uživatelé měli buď odejít nebo přejít na placenou službu Workspace. Poté se začalo hovořit o tom, že firma připravuje zvláštní nabídku pro osobní použití a nakonec se z ní vyklubala omezená varianta Workspace Essentials Starter bez GMailu. Řadě uživatelů se ale tato varianta nelíbila, proto migrovali na jiná řešení.
articles.title: Google nechá G Suite pro osobní použití zdarma včetně vlastní domény

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Docker je dnes technologie, která proces vývoje, testování a provozování softwaru velmi zjednodušuje. Provozujte cokoliv a kdekoliv. Už nečekejte na nastavení svého serveru nebo na aktualizaci nějaké knihovny. Mějte prostředí jako součást vaší aplikace.
articles.title: Naučte se pracovat s Dockerem a kontejnery (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Organizátoři zveřejnili program tradiční konference InstallFest. Připraveny jsou dvě konferenční místnosti plné přednášek a jedna určená pro praktické workshopy. Mezi tématy najdete linuxové souborové systémy, sítě, bezpečnost, elektroniku a mnoho dalšího.
articles.title: InstallFest zveřejnil program, dvoudenní konference proběhne v červnu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Oblíbený vektorový editor Inkscape dostává po zhruba roce novou verzi. Ta přináší podporu vícestránkových dokumentů, editovatelné značky a čárkované vzory, přichytávání zarovnání na plátně (plus redesign nastavení přichytávání), nový efekt „tiling“ live path, dithering přechodů či aktualizace editoru SVG písem.
articles.title: Inkscape 1.2 vylepšuje mechanismy a rozhraní

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Aktualizace uzavřených ovladačů Nvidia řad 470 a 390 zase o kus posouvá životnost dnes již velmi zastaralých GeForce (a dalších produktů tohoto výrobce). Na světě je ovladač Nvidia 470.129.06, zaměřený mimo jiné na generaci Kepler (GeForce řad GTX 600 a 700) a také ovladač Nvidia 390.151, u nějž nejstarší podporovanou grafickou kartou je GeForce GTX 580 vydaná v listopadu 2010. Ovladač přitom řeší funkčnost na současném jádru Linux 5.17.
articles.title: Nvidia aktualizovala Legacy ovladače řad 470 a 390

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Projekt FreeBSD má novou aktualizační verzi 13.1. Ta vylepšuje podporu UEFI bootu na platformě AMD64, nástroj freebsd-update pak umí automatické snapshoty boot prostředí, což by mělo eliminovat riziko nevratných chyb při aktualizacích.
articles.title: FreeBSD 13.1 vylepšuje nejen UEFI boot a ZFS

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Jistě znáte vodoznak z plochy Windows 10/11, který upozorňuje na to, že máte aktivovat Windows. Podobně vypadající jednoduchou hříčkou můžete napálit kamarády v Linuxu či macOS. Napsaná zpráva může být vlastní.
articles.title: Activate Linux: napalte kamarády s Linuxem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Bat je klonem nástroje cat pro zobrazování obsahu souborů v příkazové řádce, ale je vylepšený. Umí zvýrazňováním syntaxe a integraci Gitu. Také je napsán v Rustu. Navíc je open source pod licencí Apache a zdrojové kódy naleznete na GitHubu.
articles.title: Bat je lepší cat se zvýrazňováním syntaxe a integrací Gitu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Čtečky Amazon Kindle od začátku ignorovaly nejrozšířenější formát pro elektronické knihy EPUB. Podporovaly pouze svůj uzavřený formát MOBI (AZW) a od roku 2011 novější AZW3.
articles.title: Amazon Kindle bude umět poslat mailem EPUB, ale už ne MOBI

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Přesně před deseti lety došlo ke světovému spuštění IPv6. Ačkoli protokol IPv4 stále dominuje globálnímu internetu, podpora IPv6 už zdaleka není pouze marginální záležitostí a celosvětově se mezi uživateli pohybuje okolo 40 %. Může to souviset i s úplným vyčerpáním zásob adres IPv4 a tedy dramatickým růstem jejich cen na téměř neregulovaném trhu.
articles.title: Letošní seminář IPv6 má program a podtitul deset let poté

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Microsoft má již nějakou dobu vlastní distribuci Linuxu CBL (Common Base Linux) Mariner, která nedávno vyšla ve verzi 2.0. CBL-Mariner je upravená distribuce Linux from Scratch a používá se v Azure.
articles.title: Microsoft má kromě distribuce CBL-Mariner i druhou CBL-Delridge

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Není vám lhostejná rychlost vašich webů? Nechcete řešit DDoS útoky ani TLS certifikáty? Nechcete kupovat drahé fyzické firewally, DDoS ochrany a loadbalancery? Potom je Cloudflare ideální pomůckou jak velmi jednoduše zrychlit a ochránit Vaše weby. Dále nabízí velmi rychlé DNS, Analytics, API a mnoho dalšího.
articles.title: Cloudflare – DNS, CDN a DDoS ochrana v jednom (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Evropská komise nedávno navrhla jednotnou nabíječku s konektorem USB-C pro všechna mobilní zařízení. Zákon ještě není přijat, ale má dobré vyhlídky. Apple u svých telefonů a tabletů však využívá o něco menší konektor Lightning. Naopak notebooky Apple jsou napájeny přes USB-C s PD.
articles.title: Apple testuje iPhone s USB-C pro rok 2023

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Elon Musk hodlal koupit Twitter za 44 miliard dolarů. Dnes však napsal, že je obchod pozastaven, dokud se nevyjasní, jestli falešných a spamujících účtů je skutečně méně než 5 % z celkového počtu uživatelů. Odhadem 230 miliónů uživatelů je aktivních a odkazuje na článek Reuters.
articles.title: Musk pozastavil koupi Twitteru kvůli falešným účtům

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Oblíbený nástroj na překódovaní obrázků a videí FFmpeg přidává podporu pro výstup do obrázků ve formátu AVIF, který používá svobodné kódování AV1 v kontejneru HEIF. Použití bude jednoduché jak pro obrázek, tak i pro animovaný AVIF:
articles.title: FFmpeg přidává podporu pro výstup do obrázků AVIF

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Prohlížeč Chrome/Chromium má od verze 87 experimentální podporu Ozone pro X11 a Wayland. Ale pro Chromium ve Snapu byl Wayland explicitně zakázán, protože to nefungovalo.
articles.title: Chromium ve Snapu má povolený Wayland

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Ovladač grafických karet AMD AMDGPU pro CGN 1.2 a novější přesáhne v jádře 5.19 4 milióny řádků. Jde o největší ovladač v linuxovém jádře na počet řádků. Je to způsobeno také automaticky generovanými hlavičkovými soubory zvlášť pro každé nové GPU.
articles.title: Ovladač AMD má 4 milióny řádků, NVIDIA začíná na 1 miliónu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Včera vyšel LibreOffice 7.2.7, jedná se o poslední aktualizaci před koncem podpory řady 7.2, který nastane za měsíc tedy 12. června 2022. Ve verzi 7.2.7 bylo opraveno 47 chyb (RC1 a RC2).
articles.title: LibreOffice 7.2 dostal poslední aktualizaci, aktualizujte na 7.3

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Po jarním Ubuntu přichází také Pop!_OS. Tails konečně povyšuje na Debian „Bullseye“, stejně tak openmediavault. Nový Fedora Linux byl vydán sice se zpožděním, ale přeci. Red Hat aktualizoval Enterprise Linux 8 a alternativní sestavení následují. Mezi to vše se vešla vydání IPFire, KaOS nebo Proxmox Virtual Environment… a na závěr letmý pohled na ruský ALT Linux.
articles.title: Distribuční novinky 17-19/2022

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Zdaleka ne každý má stovky dolarů, které by chtěl utratit za softwarové upgrady svého počítače. To je také důvod, proč Goodoffer24 zastiňuje Microsoft snížením cen Windows 10 a Microsoft Office, a tím činí update mnohem dostupnějším. Můžete koupit obojí najednou a ušetřit ještě více a zde také je, co všechno můžete mít.
articles.title: Prodej softwaru v květnu: doživotní licence Windows 10 za € 11 , Office za € 23 a až 91% slevy!

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Red Hat rozšiřuje portfolio cloudových služeb. Western Digital podporuje růst kapacity cloudových úložišť. Co ukázal veletrh RaPO 2022? Edge systémy vyžadují stále vyšší výkon. Lenovo představuje nové počítače Yoga.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Edge systémy vyžadují stále vyšší výkon

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 19/2022

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Exoplanety u pulsarů. Město ze sinic funguje jako elektrárna. Planety podobné Zemi jsou obyvatelné spíše na svém počátku. Sebepoškození vlastní DNA zvyšuje odolnost rakovinných buněk vůči terapii. Teslův tajuplný elektromobil Pierce Arrow.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: V meteoritech našli i zbývající dvě nukleové báze

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Přehled dubnových vydání Jaderných novin: stav vydání jádra, citáty týdne a seznam článků týkajících se jádra.
articles.title: Jaderné noviny – přehled za duben 2022

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Hrozbám v 1. čtvrtletí dominovala kybernetická válka mezi Ukrajinou a Ruskem. Dell rozšiřuje možnosti multicloudových řešení. Objev jednosměrné supravodivosti bez magnetického pole slibuje revoluci. HPE Machine Learning Development System zrychluje nasazení umělé inteligence. Excitony mohou proudit materiálem i při pokojové teplotě
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Excitony mohou proudit materiálem i při pokojové teplotě

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 18/2022

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Technologie mají být ve vesmíru viditelnější než samotný život. Hmotnost kvarku t a stabilita vesmíru. Svět horkých Jupiterů. Kde se berou černé díry střední velikosti.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Proč ve vesmíru hledat hlavně technosignatury

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ransomware zasáhl 77 % českých organizací. Robot v pražském centru SAP Services ročně naplánuje desítky tisíc pohovorů. Válka ukrojí z evropského trhu ICT skoro 2 %. Elon Musk kupuje sociální síť Twitter za 44 miliard dolarů. Náhlavní soupravy Yealink – ideální volba pro kancelář i home office. Dell rozšiřuje nabídku edge řešení pro maloobchodníky.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Válka ukrojí z evropského trhu ICT skoro 2 %

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Bakterie rozezvučí grafen, jako bubínek. Stopy různorodého života v hornině staré snad až 4 miliardy let. Mikronova – hvězdná exploze s lokální termojadernou reakcí. Fraktální dimenze a fyzika. Kapsy v ledu Europy. Astronauti a zimní spánek.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Kromě excitonů existují i biexcitony

articles.author: Fluttershy, yay!
articles.description: Správce nástroje curl Daniel Stenberg na GitHubu průběžně vytváří svou novou knihu Uncurled, v níž shrnuje své dlouhodobé zkušenosti s údržbou open-source projektu: od odpozorovaných pouček po vtipné a ne až tak vtipné příklady e-mailů od uživatelů.
articles.title: Uncurled: zkušenosti s dlouhodobou správou open-source projektu (curl)

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána nová major verze 25.0 programovacího jazyka Erlang (Wikipedie) a související platformy OTP (Open Telecom Platform, Wikipedie). Přehled novinek v příspěvku na blogu.
articles.title: Erlang/OTP 25.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Deno (Wikipedie), běhové prostředí (runtime) pro JavaScript a TypeScript, bylo vydáno ve verzi 1.22. Přehled novinek v poznámkách k vydání.
articles.title: Deno 1.22

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Společnost Red Hat oznámila vydání Red Hat Enterprise Linuxu (RHEL) 9.0. Vedle nových vlastností a oprav chyb přináší také aktualizaci ovladačů a předběžné ukázky budoucích technologií. Podrobnosti v poznámkách k vydání.
articles.title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) 9.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Lars Knoll oznámil, že po 25 letech v ekosystému Qt, z toho 22 let pracující pro různé společnosti vlastnící Qt, odchází ze společnosti The Qt Company do malého norského startupu.
articles.title: Lars Knoll odchází z The Qt Company

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Na Kickstarteru běží kampaň na podporu mini ITX desky Turing Pi 2 Cluster Computer. Vložením 4 výpočetních modulů, podporovány jsou Raspberry Pi 4, Turing RK1 a Nvidia Jetson, lze získat 4uzlový cluster. Cena desky je 219 dolarů.
articles.title: Turing Pi 2 Cluster Computer

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Spolek OpenAlt zve příznivce otevřených řešení a přístupu na 198. brněnský sraz, který proběhne v pátek 20. května tradičně od 18 hodin v Pivovarské restauraci Moravia.
articles.title: Pozvánka na 198. sraz OpenAltu v Brně

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána nová verze 0.25 herního enginu Fyrox, původně rg3d. Přehled novinek s kódy, náhledy i videi v příspěvku na blogu.
articles.title: Fyrox (Fyrox Game Engine) 0.25

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Multiplatformní audio přehrávač Qmmp (Wikipedie) byl vydán ve verzi 2.1.0. Z novinek lze zmínit například podporu XDG Base Directory Specification.
articles.title: Qmmp 2.1.0

articles.author: Zdeněk Crhonek
articles.description: Letošní konference LibreOffice proběhne 28. září až 1. října v Bolzanu. The Document Foundation hledá přednášející.
articles.title: Konference LibreOffice 2022

articles.description: While the hostname on Linux systems is widely relied upon for different applications, setting the hostname is usually left up to user-space by the init system at boot. However, should any user-space processes try to read the system hostname prior to it being set, it could lead to unintended results. So now finally in 2022 there is a kernel parameter working its way upstream with "hostname=" should you want to ensure the hostname is set before user-space is started...
articles.title: Linux To Introduce The Ability To Set The Hostname Before Userspace Starts

articles.description: System76-Scheduler as the Linux PC vendor's effort to provide a Rust-written daemon to enhance Linux desktop responsiveness and shipping as part of their Pop!_OS distribution is out with a new feature release...
articles.title: System76 Scheduler 1.2 Released - Now Has Defaults For SteamVR, Flatpak Process Support

articles.description: Hearing "open-source", "PSP", and "security" all together got me excited with my initial reaction thinking it was about AMD's Platform Security Processor (PSP) albeit that's not the case here. Google's PSP announced today is the "PSP Security Protocol" and is designed for dealing with cryptographic hardware offloading at data center scale and used by Google already in production...
articles.title: Google Makes Public Their Open-Source PSP Security Protocol

articles.description: The Framework Laptop is a modular laptop design that launched a year ago and is designed to be upgrade-friendly and allows users for switching out lots of components from different ports to the motherboard itself. And the laptop is Linux-friendly -- see my Framework Laptop review from last year. For new systems or those wishing to upgrade their laptop's motherboard, Intel Core 12th Gen "Alder Lake" is now available...
articles.title: Upgraded Linux-Friendly Framework Laptop Shifts To Intel 12th Gen "Alder Lake"

articles.description: Intel today has lifted the embargo on SYCLomatic, their new open-source tool to help migrate code-bases targeting NVIDIA's CUDA so they can be re-purposed to target C++ and SYCL -- thereby being able to leverage Intel's graphics processors and jiving with their oneAPI goals...
articles.title: Intel Announces SYCLomatic For Open-Source Conversion Of CUDA Code To C++ SYCL

articles.description: Given the recent releases of Ubuntu 22.04 LTS and Fedora 36 among other recent OS updates, it's time for a fresh look at how various Linux distributions are performing. This Linux benchmarking bout is looking at the Xeon Platinum 8380 2P "Ice Lake" performance across Arch Linux, Debian, openSUSE, CentOS Stream, AlmaLinux, Fedora, Ubuntu, and Intel's Clear Linux.
articles.title: Intel's Clear Linux Outpacing Ubuntu 22.04 LTS, Fedora 36 & Other H1'2022 Distros

articles.description: The KDE development community today announced the release of the Plasma 5.25 beta...
articles.title: KDE Plasma 5.25 Beta Released With Many Improvements, Wayland Support Maturing

articles.description: Last week I wrote about how well known Mesa developer Samuel Pitoiset who is employed by Valve already started working on GFX11 (RDNA3) support for RADV, the open-source Radeon Vulkan driver in Mesa that isn't officially supported by AMD but remains more popular than their own "AMDVLK" driver. More GFX11/RDNA3 preparation work remains ongoing and it's looking like if trends continue this open-source driver could be ready for RDNA3 graphics cards in time for launch...
articles.title: RADV Vulkan Driver Continues At Full-Speed Preparing For RDNA3/GFX11 GPUs

articles.description: POCL as the "Portable Computing Language" that gets OpenCL running on CPUs as well as via LLVM allowing for targeting NVIDIA GPUs, AMD HSA environments, and other cases, is now preparing to roll-out OpenCL 3.0 support...
articles.title: POCL 3.0-RC1 Released For OpenCL 3.0 Implemented On CPUs

articles.description: Multi-Gen LRU (MGLRU) remains a very promising effort for enhancing Linux system performance and particularly about providing a superior experience when the Linux kernel is dealing with system memory pressure. MGLRU v11 was posted this week while we await to see if it will be mainlined come the v5.19 merge window...
articles.title: MGLRU Revved Once More For Promising Linux Performance Improvements

articles.description: Back in 2017 for the Linux 4.11 kernel the statx system call was added for allowing enhanced file information reporting. Since then various file-systems began adding Statx support and worked its way up into Glibc and the like in user-space for Linux finally having file creation time reporting and other attributes. Two separate statx-related additions are now working their way to the kernel...
articles.title: Linux FAT File Creation/Birth Time Reporting, Proposal For Statx I/O Alignment Info

articles.description: Mesa 22.1 is out today as the newest, quarterly feature update to the open-source OpenGL/Vulkan graphics driver stack that also supports video acceleration and other GPU features on the Linux desktop...
articles.title: Mesa 22.1 Released With Many Vulkan Improvements, Kopper For Zink, Imagination Driver

articles.description: Last week Red Hat announced at the Red Hat Summit that RHEL9 would be reach GA in the coming weeks while today it officially crossed that threshold...
articles.title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.0 GA Now Officially Available

articles.description: Intel today published their latest update (v2022.2) to the oneAPI Toolkits, their collection of open-source software components for empowering modern workloads across the growing world of CPUs/GPUs/XPUs...
articles.title: Intel oneAPI Toolkits 2022.2 Released With ISPCRT, More Arc Graphics Preparations

articles.description: With the upcoming Linux 5.19 cycle appearing to be the point at which Intel's DG2/Alchemist Linux graphics driver support is settling down and may end up being the base version requirement for their forthcoming discrete graphics cards, we are seeing other non-core feature work happen for these Arc Graphics products. A new feature we've only seen mentioned today for the first time by Intel is "vRAM SR", short for vRAM Self-Refresh...
articles.title: Intel Linux Driver Wiring Up New "vRAM Self Refresh" Feature For Arc Graphics Cards

articles.description: AMD on Tuesday released the Kria KR260 Robotics Starter Kit featuring a Xilinx Kria K26 System-on-Module and tailoring it for robotics, machine vision, and industrial communication/control use-cases while running Ubuntu 22.04 LTS...
articles.title: AMD Launches Xilinx + Linux Powered Robotics Starter Kit

articles.description: Security researcher Jason Donenfeld who is known for leading the development of the WireGuard open-source software has outlined a new security vulnerability affecting the Oracle VM VirtualBox software...
articles.title: VirtualBox On Linux Affected By Security Vulnerability Leaking Host Data To Guests

articles.description: The Arch Linux installer "Archinstall" that makes it simple to quickly and easily get this popular distribution installed has prepared a new release candidate where they are introducing FIDO2 support...
articles.title: Arch Linux Installer Preparing FIDO2 Support For Handling Disk Encryption

articles.description: Back in 2019 Realtek contributed the open-source "RTW88" WiFi driver to the Linux kernel for supporting their newer wireless chipsets on Linux. To date the mainline driver has just supported their PCI-based WiFi adapters while a patch series now out for review extends the driver to supporting their newer USB-specific chipsets...
articles.title: Linux Kernel Patches Posted For USB Support With Realtek RTW88 WiFi Driver

articles.description: It was just shy of one month ago that Intel and AOMedia released SVT-AV1 v1.0 and now Intel engineers have released SVT-AV1 v1.1 as the newest feature update to this CPU-based, open-source AV1 video encoder...
articles.title: Intel Releases SVT-AV1 v1.1 As It Continues Advancing Open-Source AV1 Encoding

articles.description: After 25 years being heavily involved in the Qt toolkit development, Lars Knoll announced today he is leaving The Qt Company where he currently serves as CTO and also largely departing from active work within the Qt community to "try out something else" moving forward...
articles.title: Lars Knoll Leaving The Qt Company, Starting New Chapter Outside Qt

articles.description: Valve's Vulkan-powered Gamescope Wayland compositor has merged support for NVIDIA Image Scaling...
articles.title: Valve's Gamescope Compositor Merges NVIDIA Image Scaling Support

articles.description: Qualcomm engineers are exploring bootloader-based hibernation in order to improve the user experience when restoring from a hibernated state...
articles.title: Qualcomm Exploring Bootloader-Based Hibernation For Linux

articles.description: Microsoft has made a lot of interesting developments and maneuvers over the past number of months for leveraging open-source Mesa for use by Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL) and supporting various Khronos APIs atop Direct3D 12 for use when native drivers are lacking on Windows. This work so far has been focused on OpenGL, OpenCL, and Vulkan but Microsoft has now even implemented Direct3D 12 video API support within Mesa and leverages the VA-API state tracker support within Mesa...
articles.title: Microsoft Lands VA-API To Direct3D 12 H.264 Video Encode/Decode In Mesa

articles.description: Canonical continues investing a lot in ensuring a first-rate Ubuntu experience when using Microsoft's Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL/WSL2) with Windows 10 and newer. Rather than needing to wait longer to see the fruits of that work in the next Ubuntu releases, Canonical has now made "Ubuntu Preview" available from the Microsoft Store to have a daily-updated, bleeding-edge Ubuntu experience...
articles.title: "Ubuntu Preview" Makes It Easy To Try The Bleeding-Edge Ubuntu Experience On WSL

articles.description: With the Linux 5.18 kernel reaching stable in the next week or two there is basic support for Tesla's FSD chip. That Samsung-based SoC for powering Tesla's full-self driving technology has the basic support pieces in place for this kernel while Samsung engineers are working on ironing out other portions of the SoC support for future kernel releases...
articles.title: VP9 Encoder & Other Media Functionality Of Tesla's FSD Chip To Be Upstreamed In Linux

articles.description: Last week AMD launched the Radeon RX 6650 XT / RX 6750 XT / RX 6950 XT models as RDNA2 refreshed for 2022 with higher clock speeds as an interim launch until RDNA3 graphics cards debut later in 2022. Up for Linux benchmarking today is a look at the Radeon RX 6750 XT open-source driver performance using an ASRock Challenger Pro Radeon RX 6750 XT 12GB.
articles.title: AMD Radeon RX 6750 XT Linux Gaming Performance

articles.description: Just one week after Vulkan 1.3.213 released with its four new extensions, which included an update to the ray-tracing support, Vulkan 1.3.214 is out today with various fixes while introducing just one new extension...
articles.title: Vulkan 1.3.214 Released With New AMD Vendor Extension

Most of these patches have involved memory handling under Linux and the special purpose memory handling between the CPU/GPUs. Published on Monday was their latest work on coherent device memory mappings for the Linux kernel...
articles.title: AMD Posts Latest Coherent Device Memory Mapping Linux Code - Designed For Frontier

articles.author: Wes Tacos
articles.description:
Don't rue going rogue with some rouge roux
It's Thursday, so you know what that means! No, not being disappointed that Harmonix still hasn't added in "You Get What You Give" as Rock Band DLC. That's certainly my Thursday tradition, but it doesn't have to be yours. I'm of course talking about Super Rare Games putting out another limited-run game on Switch! Up for grabs in this week's contest is Rogue Heroes: Ruins of Tasos.
Strictly limited to 4,000 copies, this one is destined to sell out — whoops my bad! I couldn't even make it through writing this post without it selling out. It's gone. Considering you can't buy it anymore, you might as well win a copy here!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nd-6akE8DT0&t=1s
I've been legally prohibited from providing my own summary of the game, so you'll …
articles.title: Contest: Win Rogue Heroes: Ruins of Tasos on Switch from Super Rare Games

articles.author: Jordan Devore
articles.description:
Trophy support is a big surprise for some of us
Classic PlayStation games are coming to PS4 and PS5 in June with the new $120-per-year PlayStation Plus Premium tier, and as it turns out, they'll have trophies — at least, some of the games will. In a tweet this afternoon, Bend Studio shared a surprise clip featuring an all-new trophy, "An Explosive Start," for the PS1 classic Syphon Filter.
In a response to a fan on Twitter, Bend Studio design manager Eric Jensen said he "helped out with a few of [the trophies], mostly naming."

https://twitter.com/BendStudio/status/1527391707733577728
In a follow-up tweet, the studio confirmed that there's even a Platinum trophy: "Excellent work, Agent!" Imagine the possibilities for your all-time faves.
Do classic trophies help incentivize PlayStation Plu…
articles.title: Classic PlayStation Plus games like Syphon Filter will have trophies

articles.author: Noelle Warner
articles.description:
Fans create the games they want to see in the world
With the disappointing release of Fallout 76 almost five years behind us, fans of the series are itching for any and all updates on the future of the beloved IP. Bethesda, on the other hand, seems to have its hands full with Starfield and the next Elder Scrolls title, so the odds of getting any new official Fallout are looking pretty slim. Thankfully, the fans are willing to take things into their own hands, because the Fallout modding community just dropped a huge bomb, as it were: Fallout London, a DLC-sized story mod of Fallout 4 that explores life after the nuclear apocalypse in England.
Fallout London's development team released a gameplay trailer that clocks in at just over eighteen minutes long, which first shows scenes of various …
articles.title: Fallout London is a DLC-sized mod that takes the series across the pond

articles.author: Noelle Warner
articles.description:
Fans are up in arms, but I think they have a point
The Iron Giant was an important movie to me growing up. I always loved the animation style, and although it's a movie that's known for being a tear-jerker, it earns it with some excellent writing. It's a shame that Warner Bros. Animation shut down in 2004, because they had some truly iconic films back in the day. I don't know anyone who wasn't touched by the story of friendship and pacifism that we saw from The Iron Giant. I think a lot of us who grew up with the film feel a bit protective over it because of how earnest it was — or at least, that's how I feel. That's why I'm up in arms about the Iron Giant kicking some ass in MultiVersus, and I know I'm not the only one who feels that way.
After seeing our favorite giant robot on the game'…
articles.title: MultiVersus director says the Iron Giant is fighting because it’s an “alternate universe”

articles.author: Jordan Devore
articles.description:
Aiming to be "the most accessible God of War ever"
Last we heard, the team at Santa Monica Studio was "heads down, hard at work" on God of War Ragnarok, with nothing new to show just yet. Today, the developers had something fresh to share about the sequel's expanded accessibility features — including better controller remapping and "more customization to our combat and interaction system."
According to lead UX designer Mila Pavlin, God of War Ragnarok will bring back accessibility features that players saw in the PC version of God of War (2018): auto sprint, an always-on reticle, and a "hold" or "toggle on/off" option for the aim stance and shield stance.
Those are just some returning options. In a PlayStation Blog post outlining some of the new features (with image and video examples incl…
articles.title: God of War Ragnarok is making a bigger push for accessibility

articles.author: Noelle Warner
articles.description:
Learning from Picasso's iconic art style
Photorealism in games can be really fun. Having characters and environments that look just like real life can help immerse you in a game's world, and it can be exciting to see how graphics continue to improve year after year. But here's the thing — I sometimes feel like we can obsess a bit too much over how real or not real a certain game's art style is, picking apart every environment and every little detail on the character models.
I think back to the PS1 era, when people thought that the first Metal Gear game was as realistic-looking as they come. Players gushed about the immersion because of how lifelike it was. We laugh about it now, but anecdotes like that really speak to how much our minds fill in the gaps when it comes to storytelling, somet…
articles.title: Painting with pixels: how stylized art can heighten a game’s narrative

articles.author: Eric Van Allen
articles.description:
Marvel heroes and villains clash in card form
A new collectible card game is mixing superheroes and villains with some digital card game talent. Marvel Snap is a new CCG set in the Marvel universe, from a team founded by former Hearthstone developers.
In today's reveal, we get a good look at the general art style before heading into some Marvel Snap gameplay. Snap is taking a multiverse approach, with tons of Marvel characters represented in card form.
Decks consist of 12 unique cards, as players duke it out over different cubes and zones. Both players play simultaneously, vying for cosmic cubes.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=61zjv1HcJDI
There are also multiple locations to win, and the ability to double-down if you think you're sure to win. It has some Gwent vibes to it, which is a bit …
articles.title: Marvel Snap is a new card game from some former Hearthstone developers

articles.author: Chris Moyse
articles.description:
Maid in Japan
It appears that the fanservice fanatics over at CyGames are getting set to launch a brand new franchise, following on from its application for "Akiba Maid War" with The Japan Trademark Association.
Cygames, renown for cutesy cult franchises such as Granblue Fantasy, The Idolmaster, and Dragalia Lost, was granted the trademark on May 10, picking up the domain name for the property soon after. No details were revealed as to the context of Akiba Maid War, with only a simple logo released so far. As noted by Gematsu, the Japanese text "Akiba Meido Sensou" is a fun pun, as "Meido" is phonetically pronounced "Maid" but as written is the word for "Underworld."
That's all well and good, CyGames, but frankly, I just want my tea and biscuits. Failing that, I just want to dress up as a maid. No doubt we will hear more about Akiba Maid War as the year progresses, as it's getting to be about that time. Maybe it'll be a great third-person console adventure, maybe it will be a garbage gacha mobile game. Until Cygames is ready to spill the tea, it could go either way. Schrodinger's Maid, if you will. (You won't.)
The post Bring your best tea tray and clompy shoes to the AKIBA MAID WAR! appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Bring your best tea tray and clompy shoes to the AKIBA MAID WAR!

articles.author: Eric Van Allen
articles.description:
June is starting to stack up
Summer is just around the corner. Alongside the sunshine and blue skies, more games showcases are cropping up for the annual airing of game showcases, like the Future Games Show.
GamesRadar+ announced today that the Future Games Show will air on Saturday, June 11 at 3 p.m. ET / noon PT. The show will air on Twitch, YouTube, and several other major streaming locales.
https://twitter.com/FutureGamesShow/status/1527334286893801488
The show advertises it will have "over 60 minutes" of trailers, world premieres, and surprises in store.
Are you ready for the summer?
It's the middle of May, just a few weeks out now from June, and already the month is getting lined up. Several showcases are already slotting their times in for the second weekend in June, kicking off with Summer Game Fest Live on June 9.
The sister show of Future, PC Gamer's PC Gaming Show, airs the following day (June 12) at 3:30 p.m. ET / 12:30 p.m. PT. And on the same day as Future Games Show, both the Guerrilla Collective and the Wholesome Games Direct will show off some games too.
Xbox and Bethesda, meanwhile, air their joint showcase on June 12 at 1 p.m. ET / 10 a.m. PT.
Other major platforms and publishers, including Sony, Nintendo, and Square Enix, have yet to formally announce their plans. Several signs are pointing to some Final Fantasy news in June though, so we can expect to see something from the publisher then.
All of these streams and announcements fall under the same week we'd usually be heading out for E3, even though there's no E3 this year. The ESA confirmed it's fully sitting out this year, planning to return in 2023. The Summer Game Fest has meanwhile risen in the interim, and will at least be kicking off the summer festivities. It's not a normal year, but it hasn't been for a while now. At least we know one weekend in June will still be crammed full of video game showcases.
The post The Future Games Show will air its summer showcase on June 11 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: The Future Games Show will air its summer showcase on June 11

articles.author: Chris Moyse
articles.description:
Magic and Mystery are part of his history...
Yep, yer boy Chris Moyse is here with more gaming news for those Of A Certain Age. Publisher Leonardo Interactive and developer Smallthings Studios have announced a brand new game starring one of the point 'n' click genre's formative home computing heroes, Simon the Sorcerer!
Neither a remaster nor a remake, Simon the Sorcerer Origins will be a prequel to the original 1993 Adventure Soft classic, as a rebellious young man falls under the tutelage of his friend, guide, and mentor, Calypso. Simon the Sorcerer Origins will retain the exploratory, point 'n' click gameplay of yore, complete with item puzzles, a wide cast of characters, and a comical, tongue-in-cheek script.
Check out an early development trailer below, courtesy of IGN.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uTnK19Ezu7Y
According to Leonardo Interactive, this officially licensed prequel features slick, cartoonish artworks, and sporting dynamic transitions that allow gameplay to flow seamlessly in and out of cutscenes. As players explore Simon's newfound powers, they will learn of the events that led up to his mythical 1990s escapade.
Fresh off of Ron Gibert's recent Return to Monkey Island announcement, point 'n click fans will be stoked to hear of Simon's return. Hopefully, this brand-new adventure will capture the magic and enchantment of its old-school roots. Simon the Sorcerer Origins will launch in 2023 on PlayStation, PC, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch platforms.
The post Point ‘n’ click hero preps for comeback in Simon the Sorcerer Origins appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Point ‘n’ click hero preps for comeback in Simon the Sorcerer Origins

articles.author: Jordan Devore
articles.description:
If you can tune out the noise, it's a lot of fun
From today until Thursday, May 26, you can download Borderlands 3 for free from the Epic Games Store — or just add it to your never-actually-gonna-play-this PC game pile.
Is it worth your time? Well, that depends on how into Borderlands you were in the early days and how open to the series you are today. I'm the type of person who can tune out a lot of the grating NPC chatter and just enjoy the character-building, loot-snatching, kinda-mindless-in-a-good-way setup — but maybe that's too tall of an order for you in 2022.
Borderlands 3 is particularly fun with co-op partners by your side (that goes for all of these games), and there are neat overpowered guns waiting to be found. Speaking of which, the PC version does allow cross-play, so if yo…
articles.title: Grab Borderlands 3 while it’s free on the Epic Games Store

articles.author: Chris Moyse
articles.description:
Gotta pump the brakes
Publisher Nacon delivered a lot of good news during yesterday's Nacon Connect presentation — including the reveal of a GreedFall sequel and a new WRC title — but this was slightly offset by the bum news that the next entry in the Test Drive Unlimited series, Solar Crown, would no longer be meeting its originally planned 2022 release date.
"With so much support from fans of the series, we know many of you will be disappointed, but our goal with Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown is to make it the most polished gaming experience in the franchise by spending more time on its development," writes Nacon in a statement on Steam. "We therefore want to thank the fan community for your support and daily involvement on the game's official Discord channel and within communities on the various social media platforms.
The attractive road racer, which was originally scheduled to launch this fall, will now arrive at some point in 2023. In addition, Nacon announced that the PS4 and Xbox One editions of the sequel have been canceled, with Solar Crown now solely in development for PS5, PC, Xbox Series X, and, perhaps surprisingly, Nintendo Switch. Perhaps the most ambitious TDU title to date, Solar Crown hopes to fully replicate a digital version of Hong Kong Island as the backdrop for its polished, high-speed racing action.
Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown is currently in development for PS5, PC, Xbox Series X, and Nintendo Switch. A closed beta is expected to launch later in 2022.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yh-B5l8xB6s
The post Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown delayed to 2023, last-gen versions canned appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown delayed to 2023, last-gen versions canned

articles.author: Chris Carter
articles.description:
Also, Touken Ranbu Warriors
Cotton Fantasy is relatively noteworthy game, a localization of Cotton Rock 'N' Roll. It's a cute 'em up that involves a witch riding a broomstick: so I'm sold in theory already. You can find the rest of the eShop offerings below. Other releases include Touken Ranbu Warriors and Deadcraft.
At the moment, we're kind of just waiting for the other shoe to drop. June is going to be a packed month, and will host both Mario Strikers: Battle League and Fire Emblem: Three Hopes (which I really want to call Three Fates). Surely, there will be a few "surprise drops" in there somewhere.
